Articles.Content:
I have a need for speed. And I mean LOTS of speed. Anyone know if there is a mod for KSP 1.1.3 that enhances time warp, or just adds more selections such as 1,000,000x, or if you are in the atmosphere of a planet (that obviously has an atmosphere [Like Kerbin, Eve, etc]) 5x, 6x, or even 10x?

        Please let me know, I hate just setting there for 1-5min just waiting for my spacecraft to start to encounter a planet far far away from Kerbol (like Eeloo or Jool [Jool needs rings, it would look amazing if it did, tell me a mod that does this as well!!])

 

Thanks! ~A Kerbal that has the name "Kerbal"
1.000.000x times warp in low orbit, and I think it has 100x physics warp.
This discussion of add-ons has been moved to Add-on Discussions.

Beware that high warp near planets can be a problem.  The max stock warp can whip you past Kerbin without the game noticing that your periapsis was in the atmosphere.  It really puzzled me before I figured out why my rocket wasn't going home like it should.
